system.description:
Trigger: You are hit by an attack. 
Effect: The triggering attack fails to hit you, and additional attack that hit you also fail to hit you until your next activation. Attacks failing to hit you do not activate on-miss effects. If any of these attacks make contact with you, that attacker loses -1 SPD stage for 5 activations.
